sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Allied Gaming observes 'unusually elevated levels' of short-selling
feed.summary: Allied Gaming, an online lottery and casino platform operator, has observed unusually elevated levels of short-selling in its shares. The company stated that a significant number of shares have been purchased and lent to short-sellers within a short period, leading to a substantial increase in its stock borrowing costs. Allied Gaming believes this activity directly impacts its share price and market valuation.

feed.title: Allied Gaming shares trade at fraction of cash value amid short-selling
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:AGAE) has reported that its shares are trading significantly below its asset value due to unusually high short-selling, with its market cap at less than 30% of its cash and short-term investments. The company, which is valued at just 0.25 times book value according to InvestingPro, is evaluating measures to protect shareholder interests. Allied Gaming also recently acquired Saiju School, invested in Bitcoin and Ethereum, and saw a court ruling in its favor regarding a shareholder dispute.

feed.title: Allied Gaming shares trade at fraction of cash value amid short-selling
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:AGAE) has reported that its market capitalization of approximately $14 million is significantly below its $53.8 million cash and short-term investments, exacerbated by unusually high short-selling activity. The company, trading at just 0.25 times book value according to InvestingPro, believes its stock is undervalued and is evaluating measures to protect shareholder interests. Despite challenges from a "prolonged shareholder control dispute," Allied Gaming remains confident in its outlook and ability to deliver long-term value, focusing on expanding its live entertainment businesses and pursuing strategic investments, including recent acquisitions and cryptocurrency ventures.

feed.title: Allied Gaming and Entertainment Issues Statement to Shareholders and the Investment Community
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ: AGAE) has issued a statement to shareholders addressing recent market activity, particularly elevated short-selling, which management believes has misaligned the company's share price with its intrinsic value. The company highlighted its strong financial fundamentals, including over US$106 million in assets and US$53.8 million in cash, contrasting this with its US$14 million market capitalization. Allied Gaming reassured investors about its strategic direction in experiential and live entertainment, committed to disciplined execution and transparent communication.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment (NASDAQ: AGAE) announced its Q3 2025 financial results, showing a revenue decrease to $1.8 million and a net loss of $5.4 million, significantly impacted by legal and professional fees related to a dissident stockholder. The company highlighted its recent acquisition of Saiju School, to be renamed Allied International Futuretech Academy, and a strategic investment in the production of "The Angry Birds Movie 3" as key corporate developments aimed at future growth.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. Reports Increased Losses Amid Revenue Decline
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) reported a Q3 revenue decline to $1.85 million from $2.16 million year-over-year, alongside a significant increase in net loss to $5.40 million. This challenging quarter saw decreased revenues from both in-person events and casual mobile gaming, compounded by a surge in general and administrative expenses. Despite these financial setbacks, the company remains focused on strategic initiatives and aims to improve financial performance through enhanced revenue streams and operational efficiency.

feed.title: Allied Gaming provides update on litigation against Knighted
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:AGAE) announced that a U.S. District Court believes the company is "reasonably likely" to succeed in its litigation against Knighted Pastures LLC, Roy Choi, and associates regarding the formation of a group under Section 13(d) regulations. Consequently, Allied's board has preliminarily determined that the "Knighted Group" triggered the company’s shareholder rights plan. The company plans to seek stockholder approval for this determination and related enforcement actions at its next annual meeting.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Provides Update on Litigation and Related Matters Involving Knighted Group
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (Nasdaq: AGAE) has provided an update on its ongoing litigation against the Knighted Group, including Knighted Pastures LLC and Roy Choi, among others. The U.S. District Court for the Central District of California indicated that Allied is likely to prove the Knighted Parties formed a group and triggered the Company's shareholder rights plan. Allied's Board of Directors plans to seek shareholder approval at the next annual meeting to confirm this determination and authorize actions related to enforcing the Rights Plan.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. SEC 10-Q Report
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) has released its Q3 2025 10-Q report, detailing a decrease in total revenues to $1.8 million and an increased net loss of $(5.4) million, primarily due to higher general, administrative, legal, and professional fees. Despite financial challenges, the company is focused on expanding its marketing efforts, entering new vertical markets like live influencer events, and strengthening its presence in the Asian market through the Allied Esports Arena Asia project. AGAE also regained compliance with Nasdaq listing rules ensuring its continued presence on the Nasdaq Capital Market.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) reported a third-quarter loss of $5.4 million, translating to a loss of 14 cents per share. The New York-based company generated $1.8 million in revenue during the period. The company's shares closed at 43 cents, down from $1.05 a year ago.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. Completes Acquisition of Saiju School to Launch Allied International Futuretech Academy
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. has completed the acquisition of Saiju School in Japan, a top vocational school, with the strategic goal of transforming it into the Allied International Futuretech Academy (AIFA). This move facilitates Allied's entry into Japan's accredited education system and will establish a dual-pathway academic model combining high school diplomas with vocational qualifications in technology, gaming, and digital media. The AIFA aims to cultivate next-generation talent through innovative curricula and global partnerships, expanding Allied's youth-focused experiential ecosystem.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. SEC 10-Q Report
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) has released its Q1 2025 Form 10-Q report, detailing a decrease in total revenues to $2.3 million and increased net losses to $(4.9) million due to higher expenses and a decline in casual mobile gaming. The company reported operational highlights across its Esports, Casual Mobile Gaming, and Live Concert Promotion segments, with a notable presence in the U.S. and China. AGAE plans future expansion into new geographies and vertical markets to drive growth.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces CEO Transition
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) announced a CEO transition, with Ms. Yinghua Chen moving to a senior strategic role focused on Allied Esports International and global animation IPs. Mr. Yangyang (James) Li, previously President and Chairman, has been appointed as the new CEO of AGAE. Mr. Li outlined a strategy to solidify core strengths, explore tokenization of real-world assets and blockchain, and address ongoing challenges with dissident shareholders.

feed.title: Allied Gaming and Entertainment Showcases Growth with Proprietary Live Events at HyperX Arena Las Vegas
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ: AGAE) is highlighting its growth by hosting proprietary live events at its HyperX Arena Las Vegas. The company recently celebrated World Esports Day, attracting hundreds of gamers, and is set to host the World Bar Flair Championship 2025, a proprietary event with a $25,000 prize pool, demonstrating its commitment to diversified experiential entertainment. These events underscore Allied's leadership in live entertainment, esports, and global event production, aiming for sustainable long-term growth and enhanced shareholder value.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Participation in the Investment of The Angry Birds Movie 3 Production Through Flywheel Media
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment (AGAE) has announced its participation in the investment of _The Angry Birds Movie 3_ production through Flywheel Media. This move aligns with Allied's strategy to support globally recognized franchises that integrate storytelling, gaming, and cultural influence. The movie, featuring Jason Sudeikis and Josh Gad, is set for a global theatrical release on January 29, 2027, distributed by Paramount Pictures.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. Hosts World Esports Day Celebration and Announces Return of World Bar Flair Championship at HyperX Arena Las Vegas
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ: AGAE) celebrated World Esports Day at its HyperX Arena Las Vegas, featuring interactive gaming events and attracting numerous participants. The company also announced the upcoming World Bar Flair Championship, scheduled for November 3-4, 2025, where top flair bartenders will compete for a $25,000 prize pool. These events highlight Allied's commitment to community engagement and innovation in live entertainment, aiming to enhance shareholder value and solidify its position in the esports and experiential entertainment sectors.

feed.title: Allied Gaming’s Recent Legal Win: Boosting Confidence?
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc.'s stock surged by 96.38% after a significant legal victory against Knighted Pastures, terminating a proxy contest and gaining preliminary relief in federal court. Despite a decrease in Q2 revenue and EPS, the company emphasizes future strategies including a strategic investment in Angry Birds 3, leveraging its legal win for strategic clarity and growth initiatives. The article discusses AGAE's financial dynamics, market profile, and strategic focus amidst legal battles and evolving market conditions.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment stock forecast 2025-2030: What should we expect next from the volatile AGAE stock price?
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment (AGAE) stock has seen significant volatility, including a 90% rise in 2025, but faces challenges from ongoing shareholder disputes and increased losses due to legal fees. Management has outlined a strategic plan focusing on revenue growth, acquisitions, and partnerships, with a new CEO appointed to navigate these efforts. Analysts offer mixed forecasts for the stock's future performance, highlighting the need for resolution of legal issues for stability.

feed.title: Promising Esports Stocks Worth Watching – October 16th
feed.summary: This article highlights three promising esports stocks: Allied Gaming & Entertainment (AGAE), NIP Group (NIPG), and Motorsport Games (MSGM). These companies were identified by MarketBeat's stock screener due to their high dollar trading volume recently, offering investors exposure to the growing esports market despite its cyclical and volatile nature. The article provides a brief overview of each company's operations within the esports industry.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (NASDAQ:AGAE) Short Interest Down 77.2% in September - Defense World
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc.'s (NASDAQ:AGAE) short interest significantly decreased by 77.2% in September. Geode Capital Management LLC increased its stake in AAGA, demonstrating investor interest despite a 4.3% drop in the stock price. The company operates as an experiential entertainment company focusing on esports venues and live events.

feed.title: Video Game Stocks To Consider – October 16th - Defense World
feed.summary: This article identifies four video game stocks to watch: Turtle Beach (TBCH), Alliance Entertainment (AENT), Allied Gaming & Entertainment (AGAE), and Motorsport Games (MSGM). It provides a brief description of each company's business operations and highlights the video game sector as one with high growth potential but also volatility due to hit titles and changing monetization models.

feed.title: Ourgame International Clarifies Statement and Resumes Trading - TipRanks
feed.summary: Ourgame International Holdings Ltd (HK:6899) clarified that Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. is an associate, not a subsidiary, of the group. Following this correction, the company's shares resumed trading on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange after a temporary suspension. Ourgame International specializes in online and offline gaming and entertainment services.

feed.title: Ourgame International Embraces Blockchain with Strategic Crypto Investment - TipRanks
feed.summary: Ourgame International Holdings Ltd (HK:6899) has announced a strategic investment in cryptocurrencies through its subsidiary, Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. This move initiates a comprehensive digitalization strategy to integrate blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum into its operations and balance sheet. The company aims to reshape the industry value chain, enhance user engagement, and facilitate cross-border transactions through this technological innovation.

feed.title: Top Esports Stocks To Research - October 11th - MarketBeat
feed.summary: MarketBeat highlights five top esports stocks with the highest recent trading volumes: NIP Group, Allied Gaming & Entertainment, Motorsport Games, Esports Entertainment Group, and EBET. These companies operate in the rapidly growing esports industry, generating revenue from media rights, sponsorships, and in-game purchases. The article provides a brief overview of each company and their role in the competitive video gaming market.

feed.title: Esports Stocks To Keep An Eye On - October 10th - MarketBeat
feed.summary: This article highlights seven esports stocks to watch, including NIP Group, Allied Gaming & Entertainment, Motorsport Games, and Esports Entertainment Group, given the rapid growth of the competitive video gaming market. It provides a brief overview of each company's operations, focusing on their roles in game development, tournament organization, and online gambling platforms. The article emphasizes that investors are looking to capitalize on the increasing engagement and expansion of the global esports market.

feed.title: Allied Gaming's Crypto Investment: A Guide to Smart Treasury Management
feed.summary: Allied Gaming has made a significant investment in Bitcoin and Ethereum, signaling a strategic move into the crypto asset class for the gaming and entertainment company. This investment, led by CEO Yangyang (James) Li, aims to incorporate blockchain and tokenization into their business model, particularly in esports. The article discusses how this approach serves as a case study for businesses considering digital asset investments, highlighting the importance of compliance, risk management, and strategic integration of blockchain technologies.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) Stock: Surges 101% After Bold Bitcoin & Ethereum Investment
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) experienced a dramatic 101% surge in pre-market trading following its announcement of a strategic investment in Bitcoin and Ethereum. This move signals a significant pivot towards blockchain integration within its gaming and entertainment operations. The company plans to use Bitcoin for asset diversification and as a foundation for blockchain projects, while Ethereum will enable tokenization models and generate new revenue streams in the Web3 environment.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Strategic Investment in Bitcoin and Ethereum
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment, Inc. (AGAE) has announced a strategic initial investment in Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH) as part of its corporate treasury management to diversify its asset base and embrace cryptocurrency. This move paves the way for AGAE's broader blockchain and Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization initiatives, aligning with its vision to integrate innovative financial technologies into gaming and entertainment. Future plans include expanding blockchain-based payments, developing RWA tokenization models, and integrating stablecoins and utility tokens within its digital ecosystem.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment regains Nasdaq compliance after annual meeting
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. has regained compliance with Nasdaq Listing Rule 5620(a) after the Nasdaq Hearings Panel determined that the company is now in compliance following its combined annual meeting for 2024 and 2025 stockholders. This decision came after the company had previously faced delisting procedures for failing to hold an annual meeting within the required timeframe. The situation is now considered closed by Nasdaq.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment (NASDAQ: AGAE) reported a 27% decrease in total revenues for Q2 2025, reaching $1.9 million, alongside an increased net loss of $4.8 million. The company's CEO, Mr. Yangyang Li, acknowledged the impact of shareholder disruptions but expressed confidence in strategic initiatives, including investments in iconic IPs. Despite financial challenges, AGAE highlighted hosting 75 events during the quarter and maintaining a cash and short-term investments position of $60.0 million.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) Stock: Q1 Loss Widens Despite Revenue Outlook Stability
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) reported a widened Q1 2025 net loss of $4.9 million, despite management reaffirming revenue guidance. Revenue declined 4.4% year-over-year, and EPS dropped to -$0.11, impacted by rising expenses. New CEO Yangyang (James) Li is focusing on mobile gaming, experiential entertainment, and blockchain integration for future growth amid leadership changes and shareholder disputes.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Strategic Investment from Yellow River Global Capital
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) announced a strategic investment from Yellow River Global Capital, an alternative private equity manager, which includes a financial investment of $6,600,000 for 6,000,000 shares of common stock and a warrant to purchase an additional 6,000,000 shares. This partnership aims to enhance AGAE's growth opportunities in location-based entertainment and content intellectual property, with Yellow River also gaining a seat on AGAE's Board of Directors. Mr. Zongmin (Philip) Ding has been appointed as a Class A Director to the Board.

feed.title: AGAE Stock Price and Chart — NASDAQ:AGAE
feed.summary: This article provides a detailed overview of Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc. (AGAE) stock performance, key financials, and company information. It includes price charts, earnings estimates, market capitalization, employee data, and a company description, along with technical analysis and frequently asked questions for potential investors.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Partnership with World Poker Tour and Wynn Macau
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment (AGAE) has announced a partnership with World Poker Tour (WPT) and Wynn Macau to bring an inaugural WPT event to Macau. AGAE will assist in the marketing, production, and management of WPT Macau, which will take place from June 18-24, 2024, at Wynn Macau. This collaboration marks WPT's first physical presence in Macau and aims to enhance the region's status as a global tourism and leisure center.

feed.title: Allied Gaming and Entertainment secures $6.6m investment
feed.summary: Allied Gaming and Entertainment has received a $6.6 million strategic investment from private equity manager Yellow River Global Capital. This investment also establishes a strategic relationship including resource provision, networking, and industry expertise from Yellow River. As part of the deal, Yellow River will subscribe to 6 million shares, receive a warrant for an additional 6 million shares, and appoint a director to Allied Gaming and Entertainment's Board.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment, Inc. Acknowledges and Responds to Schedule 13D Filings by Stockholders
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment, Inc. (AGAE) has acknowledged Schedule 13D filings from stockholders Ourgame International Holdings Limited and Knighted Pastures LLC. AGAE's Board rejected Ourgame's demands to acquire more shares and amend bylaws, stating these are contrary to company interests and inconsistent with the merger agreement, while also agreeing to review Ourgame's director candidates. In response to Knighted Pastures, AGAE committed to holding its 2024 Annual Meeting of Stockholders by December 31, 2024, in accordance with Nasdaq requirements.

feed.title: HyperX Arena Las Vegas secures Eureka Ergonomic partnership
feed.summary: Eureka Ergonomic has partnered with HyperX Arena Las Vegas to supply gaming chairs, specifically their Typhon and Python Hybrid models, to the 30,000-square-foot facility. This collaboration aims to enhance the gaming experience by providing ergonomic seating, joining other brands like OMEN and HyperX in equipping the arena's numerous gaming stations. The partnership highlights a commitment to player comfort and well-being within the prominent esports venue.

feed.title: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Announces Strategic Investment from Elite Fun Entertainment
feed.summary: Allied Gaming & Entertainment, Inc. announced a strategic investment from Elite Fun Entertainment Co. Ltd., a Macau-based cultural and entertainment company. Elite Fun Entertainment will acquire 7,330,000 shares of AGAE common stock for $6,597,000 and will collaborate with AGAE on organizing live shows and events in Asia. This partnership aims to leverage Elite Fun Entertainment's expertise and existing relationships with platforms like Tencent and Douyin to amplify AGAE's reach in the Asian market.

feed.title: Allied Esports renews naming rights for HyperX Arena in Las Vegas
feed.summary: Allied Esports has renewed its naming rights deal for the HyperX Arena Las Vegas, continuing a partnership that began in 2018. This multi-year agreement includes co-branded experiences and HP Inc. updating the arena's technology with Omen and HyperX products. The arena has hosted over 700 events and welcomed half a million visitors despite COVID lockdowns, contributing to Allied Gaming & Entertainment's (NASDAQ: AGAE) 28% revenue increase in 2022.

feed.title: HyperX and Allied Esports Renew Exclusive Naming Rights for Renowned Esports and Gaming Destination - HyperX Arena Las Vegas
feed.summary: HyperX and Allied Esports have renewed their exclusive naming rights agreement for the HyperX Arena Las Vegas. This multi-year deal ensures HyperX continues prominent branding and partnership on co-branded experiences at the leading esports and gaming venue located at Luxor Hotel and Casino. The renewal also includes retrofitting the arena's gaming zones with HP Inc. OMEN PCs and monitors, further enhancing the gaming experience with HyperX peripherals.

feed.title: HyperX Extends Las Vegas Esports Arena Naming Rights
feed.summary: HyperX has renewed its exclusive naming rights agreement for Allied Esports’ HyperX Arena Las Vegas at Luxor Hotel and Casino. This multiyear arrangement ensures HyperX's continued prominent branding and partnership on co-branded experiences. The arena will also be retrofitted with HP Inc. OMEN PCs and monitors, while HyperX continues to supply gaming peripherals.

feed.title: OTK ELEVATED Season 2 Starts Now: Who Will Become The Next Top Streamer? – Esports News Network
feed.summary: OTK ELEVATED Season 2 has begun, offering aspiring streamers a chance to become the next top content creator. Presented by Progressive Insurance and Allied Esports Studios in partnership with OTK, the season features higher stakes and more prizes, including a $50,000 grand prize and a spot in the Allied Esports Mentorship program. Rotating hosts, including prominent OTK members, will guide contestants through unorthodox challenges, and viewer interaction will play a significant role in eliminations and the final winner selection.

feed.title: Allied Esports Entertainment explores options, including HyperX Arena sale
feed.summary: Allied Esports Entertainment is considering various options for its future, including potentially selling its esports business and the HyperX Esports Arena on the Las Vegas Strip. The company recently sold its World Poker Tour business for $105 million and intends to use funds from any future sales to shift towards online entertainment, real money gaming, or other gaming sectors. Allied Esports reported a net loss of $2.94 million in the second financial quarter.

feed.title: Allied Esports, NASCAR announce gaming truck event tour
feed.summary: Allied Esports and NASCAR are partnering to launch an event tour featuring the Allied Esports Truck, North America's only 18-wheel gaming truck. This tour will bring gaming activations to racing fans at seven NASCAR Cup Series race midways and fan zones in 2021, offering gameplay, prizes, and a demo of the new NASCAR 21 video game. The initiative aims to integrate gaming into major sporting events to attract new audiences and highlight gaming as a crucial part of the NASCAR experience.

feed.title: Allied Esports CEO Frank Ng steps down
feed.summary: Allied Esports Entertainment (AESE) has appointed Libing (Claire) Wu as its new CEO, president, and general counsel, replacing Frank Ng who resigned after two years. Wu's appointment follows the company's recent sale of the World Poker Tour. Shares in Allied Esports Entertainment closed 7.17 percent lower following the announcement.

feed.title: Ourgame subsidiary completes US$105 million sale of World Poker Tour
feed.summary: Allied Esports Entertainment, a Nasdaq-listed eSports and poker venture partly owned by Ourgame International Holdings, has completed the sale of its World Poker Tour (WPT) assets for US$105 million to Element Partners, LLC. This transaction followed a bidding war that saw Element Partners increase its initial bid after Bally's made a higher offer. The sale proceeds will now be used to strengthen Allied Esports' remaining esports business.

feed.title: Allied Esports completes WPT sale to Element Partners
feed.summary: Allied Esports Entertainment has finalized the sale of its World Poker Tour (WPT) business to Element Partners for $105 million, a significant increase from the initial offer. This sale allows Allied Esports to focus on its esports business, while WPT moves into a new chapter under Element Partners' ownership. Shares of Allied Esports Entertainment closed down 2.64 percent following the announcement.

feed.title: Allied Esports Entertainment Completes Sale of World Poker Tour® to Element Partners, LLC
feed.summary: Allied Esports Entertainment (NASDAQ: AESE) announced the completion of the sale of its World Poker Tour® entities to Element Partners, LLC for $105 million. This transaction, approved by stockholders on July 1, 2021, allows AESE to focus on growing its esports business, Allied Esports, and utilize the cash resources from the sale. The company's CEO, Frank Ng, expressed enthusiasm for both AESE's refocused future and WPT's new chapter.

feed.title: Allied Esports Names ViewSonic Official Gaming Monitor and Official Streamer Room Partner of HyperX Esports Arena Las Vegas
feed.summary: Allied Esports has named ViewSonic as the Official Gaming Monitor and Official Streamer Room Partner of its HyperX Esports Arena Las Vegas. This multiyear agreement will see ViewSonic outfit all gaming stations and the renovated Streamer Room with their ELITE™ XG270 monitors and 4K Ultra HD displays. The partnership aims to enhance the gaming experience at the arena and will include extensive branding, marketing, and promotional support for ViewSonic.

feed.title: Allied Esports’ VIE.gg CS:GO Legend Series Reaches 1.7 Million Unique Viewers
feed.summary: Allied Esports' VIE.gg CS:GO Legend Series tournament drew 1.7 million unique viewers, becoming the company's most-watched Legend Series event. This event, combined with the Allied Esports Odyssey, resulted in 4 million unique viewers and significant increases in new users, deposits, and social media engagement for Allied Esports and its partner Esports Entertainment Group. The tournament was also the first esports event registered for legal betting in New Jersey.
